ass1.swen22

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • ass1.swen22.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the most important class in the game. because whatever the pieces change, the pieces are all inside the pieceBoard Basically, the board does excute every command,except undo and pass command
    Author:
    minpingyang

      • weaponCompare

        public int weaponCompare(char neighbourWeap,
                         char selfWeap)
        This method is used to determining the action the neighbour piece and current piece, once one of them has a sword pointing to each other, -> which means here definitely has a interaction between them
        Parameters:
        -- - neighBourWeapon --> pass the weapon of neighbour
        Returns:
        int -->0->both dead 1->neighbour move back 2->self dead 3->self move back 4->neighbourd dead

      • checkReactionHelper

        public int checkReactionHelper(java.lang.String direction,
                               Piece neighbour,
                               Piece self)
        This method is also a helper method, which is used to indicate what action current piece or its neighbour piece should do But, this method classfily the action depends on the neighbour relative postion of the current piece
        Parameters:
        direction - --> the neighbour releative position of the actived piece
        neighbour-> - the neighbour piece
        self-> - the current actived piece
        Returns:
        int -->0->both dead 1->neighbour move back 2->self dead 3->self move back 4->neighbourd dead

      • checkReaction

        public boolean checkReaction()
                      throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method is ued to check if there is reaction in the current board Basically, The method just check whether current piece with its four direction neighbouring pieces, either of them has a sword to point to actived pieces Or, the current pieces has a sword pointing to one of its neighbour. If it is, which means there is a reaction in the current board secondly, the method also change the current piece boar, if there is reaction happens in current board
        Returns:
        --boolean --> the boolean value indicates there is reaction happen in the current piece board
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • pushBackDir

        public java.lang.String pushBackDir(java.lang.String key,
                                    boolean isSelf)
        This method is ued to
        Parameters:
        key - -> the postion of its neighbour piece right/left/botton/top
        isSelf-> - a boolean value which indicate its current piece be pushed back Or its neighbour piece will be pushed back
        Returns:
        direation -> return the pushed direction which will be matched with the move method direction--> up/down/right/left

        Returns:

      • findPieceCoord

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> findPieceCoord(char pieceName)
        A helper method is used to find the row and col of the give piece name in the piece board
        Parameters:
        pieceName - pass the piece name which want to be found
        Returns:
        arrayList a list which storing the row and the col of the given name pieces under in the 2D array piece board

      • moveHelper

        public boolean moveHelper(int row,
                          int col)
        A helper method is uesd to help move method after a piece moved, it's position pobably invalid, eg. out of border of the baord.
        Parameters:
        row - col the row and col of piece
        Returns:
        boolean indicate if it is possible to move over there

      • removeHelper

        public Piece removeHelper(int row,
                          int col)
        a remove helper method, which is used to check after a piece move to other position, what piece should be added again in it's privous position, for example, if it's original position is creation grid, then should be add the creation piece
        Parameters:
        row - col -> the coordinator of the piece

      • movePiece

        public boolean movePiece(char pieceName,
                         java.lang.String dir,
                         boolean isPushed)
        The move method is used to do move action
        Parameters:
        pieceName - pass the piece name which will be used to find what piece should be moved
        dir - -> the move direction -> up/right/left/down
        isPushed - -> a boolean-> indicate the move is because of being pushed or actively moved
        Returns:
        a boolean indicates if move the piece successfully

      • printBoard

        public void printBoard()
        This method is used to print out the board, which depends on what the type of the piece in the 2D So, firstly, fill all pieces into 2D array Then, print out the piece and their equipments(weapon) to the 30*30 board
